name: oci_num_fields
purpose: Returns the number of result columns in a statement

return.description: Returns the number of columns as an integer, or FALSE on errors.

notes.description:
In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must use ocinumcols instead.
    This name still can be used, it was left as alias of
    oci_num_fields for downwards compatability.
    This, however, is deprecated and not recommended.
